text:
We revisited our findings from the 2018 Warranties in the Void report, only to find that all 43 of the manufacturers we surveyed still voided their warranties for independent or self-repair. This is generally understood to violate the Magnuson-Moss Warranty Act. Once again, we’re calling on the FTC to restore consumers’ Right to Repair the things they own.

USPIRG.ORG
Warranties in the Void II | U.S. PIRG
